content:
Dear [Customer],

Thank you for your interest in our product! We appreciate your willingness to pay $13 for it. However, due to our invoicing policies, we are unable to create an invoice for less than $20.

I understand that this may be an inconvenience for you, but I'd like to offer you a win-win solution. We have another product that I think would be a great fit for you, and it is priced at $13. If you are willing to consider this product, we can create an invoice for a total of $26, which would satisfy our invoicing requirements.

This additional product is [describe the product and its benefits], and I think it would be a great addition to your purchase. Plus, by adding this product, you'll get more value for your money!

Please let me know if this is something you would be interested in, and we can proceed with the invoice creation. Thank you for considering our products, and we look forward to serving you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
